explains: n. （医院用来移动病人的）轮床

sentences.en: Blinking, Jake slowly sits up on the gurney.
sentences.cn: 闪回杰克慢慢地从病床上坐起来。

sentences.en: A woman in scrubs steered a gurney around us.
sentences.cn: 一个上了面部磨砂的女人推着轮床在我身边走过。

sentences.en: They slid the frozen body onto a stainless steel gurney.
sentences.cn: 他们将那个冰冻的身躯滑移至不锈钢轮床上。
